TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColumnReorderedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过将属性设置为来`true`取消该事件。The event can be canceled by setting the property to `true`. 但是, 如果取消该事件, 则不会更改为值。However, if the event is cancelled, the will not change to the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ListView1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
